content: अंतिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अंतः सामीप्यं अस्यास्तीति मत्वर्थीयः ठन्; according to <ls>Nir.</ls> from आ-नी; अंतिकं कस्मात् आनीतं भवति सन्निकृष्टत्वात्] {@--1@} Near, proximate (with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab> <ls>P. II. 3. 34</ls>). {@--2@} Reaching to the end of, reaching to; नासांतिक <ls>Ms. 2. 46.</ls> {@--3@} Lasting till, until; as far as, up to; <ls>Ms. 3. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 36.</ls> --कं Nearness, proximity, vicinity, presence; न त्यजंति ममांतिकं <ls>H. 1. 46</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>; °न्यस्त <ls>R. 2. 24</ls>; कर्ण°चरः <ls>Ś. 1. 24</ls>; सिंहासनांतिकचरेण सहोपसर्पन् <ls>M. 1. 12</ls> a servant in attendance upon the throne. {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} (with <ab>abl.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab> or as last member of <ab>comp.</ab>) Near (to), in the vicinity; अंतिकं ग्रामात्-ग्रामस्य वा <ls>Sk.</ls>; into the presence or proximity of; दूरस्थस्यैत्य चांतिकं <ls>Ms. 2. 197</ls>; प्रविष्टे पितुरंतिकं <ls>Rām.</ls>; so जनांतिकं, मृगांतिकं; अंतिकेन near (with <ab>gen.</ab>); अंतिकेन ग्रामस्य <ls>P. II. 3. 35</ls>; अंतिकात् near, closely, within the presence of; from the proximity of, from near, from (<ab>abl.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>acc.</ab>); °कादागतः <ls>P. VI. 2. 49</ls>; रजःकणैः स्पृशद्भिर्गात्रमंतिकात् <ls>Rām.</ls>; क्रीणीयाद्यस्त्वपत्यार्थं मातापित्रोर्यमंतिकात् <ls>Ms. 9. 174</ls> from; so नैव प्रवृत्तिं शृणुमस्तयोः कस्यचिदंतिकात् <ls>Rām.</ls>; अंतिके near, closely, in the presence of or proximity of; <ls>Bg. 13. 15</ls>; दमयंत्यास्तदांतिके निपेतुः <ls>Nala. 1. 22</ls>; °के स्त्रियाः <ls>Ms. 2. 22.</ls>
